text: James Corden put Jennifer Lopez in the hot seat on The Late Late Show on Thursday night ( May 4 ). Host Corden did his best to get J. Lo to to spill the goods on her new romance with baseball great Alex Rodriguez. He started out by saying, “ You ’ ve been spending some time in Miami, ” then pretended to forget who Lopez is currently dating, but kept digging for an answer. Ultimately Ms. Jenny from the Block admitted to spending time with Yankee ’ s former star third baseman, A - Rod. The questioning made Lopez blush. “ Please don ’ t do this to me, ” she begged. “ It ’ s a devilishly handsome couple, ” Corden complimented. “ Thank you. He ’ s the best. You would love him, ” Lopez replied. “ Honestly, he ’
